event.title: was formally incorporated by the state assembly on November 2, 1820

data.event: Franklin was formally incorporated by the state assembly on November 2, 1820, on a 62-acre (250,000 m2) tract of land.
The post office was established on September 29, 1822, with Robert W. Simpson as postmaster.

event.title: operates a golf course there, today

data.event: PGA golfer Kenny Perry spent most of his childhood in Franklin, and operates a golf course there, today.
